author: China Uncensored
description:
Operation Honey Pot: Paste this emoji 🍯 in your comment below.
Xi Jinping has spent years purging his enemies—but now, his paranoia is turning inward. As rumors swirl about military power struggles, one man inside the Chinese Communist Party could pose the biggest threat to Xi’s grip on power. Chris Chappell breaks down why Xi fears General Zhang Youxia—and how it could all end in betrayal.

Background—By The Time You Watch This, Xi Jinping May Already Be DEAD https://youtu.be/0EVjxXz_KFQ

title: Xi’s Purge Backfires: Has China’s Dictator Lost Control of His Own Army?
